verses.name: Zechariah 1:8
verses.text: I saw by night, and behold a man riding upon a red horse, and he stood among the myrtle trees that were in the bottom; and behind him were there red horses, speckled, and white.

verses.name: Zechariah 1:9
verses.text: Then said I, O my lord, what are these? And the angel that talked with me said unto me, I will shew thee what these be.

verses.name: Zechariah 1:10
verses.text: And the man that stood among the myrtle trees answered and said, These are they whom the Lord hath sent to walk to and fro through the earth.
